alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 11:57AM EDT until June 29 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN VANDERBURGH...EAST CENTRAL POSEY...CENTRAL HENDERSON AND NORTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES... At 1057 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Corydon, or near Henderson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Evansville, Henderson and Corydon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 141 and 148. Audubon Parkway between Mile Markers 1 and 6. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
